resources.string: Adobe Flash Player is not installed!

Thus LocalTV work you need the latest free Adobe Flash Player!

If you have had already installed it once you can relate it back from the 'Google Play' Store.
If you have never had it you can use 'Direct Download' to download and install it.
To watch the Live streams without any problems, please download and install the free Sol HLS Player from the Google Play Store.
You are not connected to the internet!
Watching TV consumes a lot of data. I recommend the use of a wireless network.
Is a local station missing? If it\'s possible I will add it (only local and special interest channels!). Click the email and tell me your wishes. \n\n androider@wolke7.net
© 2013 by Koni\n\nContents belong to their respective copyright holders. LocalTV has no connection to the provider of the internet streams.

LocalTV has arisen because I missed a couple of TV channels on my Android device. The goal of LocalTV is to provide a few smaller local and special interest television channels on your Android device. The bigger, more commercial stations can be found here. You can find them at:
Some local stations do not have a live internet stream. However, they have a large archive of shows. To get quickly to the recent broadcasts I\'ve added a link to their broadcast archives.

Hello Koni

I am missing the following station:
This station does not have a live stream to the internet.\nBut have fun browsing the archive!
Add favourites by long click on the station name\nRemove favourites by long click on the station name in the \'Favourites\' tab

Do you have problems with LocalTV?
Do you see just a black screen?
Doesn't stop the sound?

Click "App-Info" below and "Clear Data" and/or "Force stop". Caution: "Clear Data" will also delete the favourites.
After this start LocalTV again.
PRESS screen to start SRF stream !!!! Then wait 30 sec. for video signal.
No favorites yet.\nTo add a favourite just long press on a station name.
Use flash when no other stream present
